synopsis.text:
After securing his first job, Maeda eagerly embraces the independence of living alone in a cozy, albeit bath-less, apartment. His new life takes an unexpected turn when he encounters his middle school-aged landlord, Chie Satonaka. Despite her youthful appearance, Chie demonstrates remarkable maturity by managing the cooking and housework, occasionally reminding Maeda of a doting grandmother. Yet, she also relishes her everyday middle school experiences with friends, striking a delightful balance between responsibility and adolescence.

Maeda's ordinary life becomes even more intriguing when he meets his alluring neighbor, Reiko Shirai. As Maeda navigates his newfound freedom, he finds himself surrounded by a vibrant cast of characters, each adding a unique flavor to his daily adventures. Ouya-san wa Shishunki! is a heartwarming slice-of-life anime that captures the essence of growing up while exploring the amusing dynamics between Maeda, Chie, and Reiko. With its endearing characters and comedic twists, this anime is sure to bring a smile to your face.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
